word_mean: 有毒的：属于、由于某种毒物或有毒物性质的，同toxic，venomous

sentence.Network_en: Poisonous smoke had got into the water supply.
sentence.Network_cn: 毒烟已经进入供水系统。

sentence.Network_en: There are hundreds of poisonous spiders and snakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 毒蜘蛛和毒蛇成百上千。

entry.def: Something that is poisonous will kill you or make you ill if you swallow or absorb it.

example.ex: All parts of the yew tree are poisonous, including the berries.
example.tran: 紫杉的各个部分都有毒，包括浆果。

entry.def: An animal that is poisonous produces a poison that will kill you or make you ill if the animal bites you.

example.ex: There are hundreds of poisonous spiders and snakes.
example.tran: 毒蜘蛛和毒蛇成百上千。

entry.tran: 极令人厌恶的；会造成危害的；恶毒的
entry.def: If you describe something as poisonous, you mean that it is extremely unpleasant and likely to spoil or destroy a good relationship or situation.

example.ex: ...lying awake half the night tormented by poisonous suspicions.
example.tran: 醒着躺了半宿，为卑劣的猜疑所折磨

means.word_mean: 1. having the qualities or effects of a poison
3. marked by deep ill will; deliberately harmful;

auth_sentence.content: Don't swallow poppers, it's very poisonous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't swallow poppers, it's very poisonous.

auth_sentence.content: The ocean-dwelling fungus Streptomyces avermitilis is poisonous to barnacles.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ocean-dwelling fungus Streptomyces avermitilis is poisonous to barnacles.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ocean-dwelling fungus Streptomyces avermitilis is poisonous to barnacles.

auth_sentence.content: That is a poisonous idea supported by questionable evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is a poisonous idea supported by questionable evidence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is a poisonous idea supported by questionable evidence.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表示"……的"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rigor严格,严厉,苛刻,严密+ous……的→adj.严格的,严厉的,严酷的,严密的,严谨的
advantage优势,有利条件,利益+ous……的→adj.有利的,有助的
courage勇气,精神+ous……的→adj.勇敢的,无畏的
danger危险,危险物,威胁+ous……的→adj.危险的,不安全的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: poison毒药+ous……的→adj.有毒的,恶意的,恶毒的,道德败坏的

means.word_mean: (动物和昆虫)     分泌毒素的；能毒伤人的

sentences.en: He was bitten by a poisonous snake.
This medicine is poisonous if taken in large quantities.
sentences.cn: 这种药如服过量是会中毒的。

means.word_mean: 极端讨厌（或不友善）的；恶毒的；邪恶的

sentences.en: He gave her a poisonous look.

jushi.english: He gave her a poisonous look.
He was bitten by a poisonous snake.
This medicine is poisonous if taken in large quantities.
jushi.chinese: 这种药如服过量是会中毒的。
